pageContext.title: Hops Kill Nazis
pageContext.description: 5AM Saint's big brother. Dry- hopping with Chinook gave Hops Kill Nazis a full-on, instantly recognisable US hop character - huge resinous aromas (think giant redwood) with a bitter grapefruit edge. The caramel malts bring flavours of toffee and burnt sugar, which gave Hops Kill Nazis a big, complex malt base supporting the intense hopping.
pageContext.author: Sam Mason <samjbmason>
